analysis.purpose: To provide an edited invitation for Jeffrey Epstein to forward and discuss literary interests

notable_quotes: "I'm going upstairs to hunt for my copy of Lolita, or will get on my kindle and reread on our way to Australia."
"The prose is gorgeous, and the book has-- come to think of it-- similar themes to Lolita in that it's about a man whose whole life is stamped forever by his impression of a young girl."
"I'm so sorry about what happened with WA. I will keep the 'bootleg' episode and hope to release someday."

analysis.summary: Lisa New emails Jeffrey Epstein with an edited invitation to forward to Serena Williams, discusses literary interests including Lolita, and references a mysterious 'WA' situation and 'bootleg' episode they hope to release someday.
